CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 4, 1951, pg. 12 reads: "We And They Club - Charming Beltzhoover residents banded together as the We and They Bridge Club, entertained ten tables of socialites Tuesday afternoon in pretty garden of president, Mrs. Charles Jones, of Sylvania Avenue. Members shown include, front row, Mesdames Harry G. Washington, Bertha Brown, Iona Schwing, Charles Jones and Charles Rickmond.  Rear: Mesdames John Ball Sr., Wilmer Jones, Tony Smith and Miss Betty Jones. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of nine We and They Bridge Club members, from left, front row: Mrs. Harry G. Washington, Bertha Brown, Iona Schwing, Mrs.Charles Jones, and Mrs. Charles Rickmond; rear: Mrs. John Ball Sr., Mrs. Wilmer Jones, Mrs. Tony Smith, and Betty Jones, posed on lawn of Mrs. Charles Jones, Sylvania Avenue, for garden party
